Footer.partner: Technical Partner: Developed by Transport Committee

Dashboard.privateBusDescription: The easiest way to book a bus. Just tell us your needs and we'll send you a quote.
Dashboard.msrtcDescription: Submit a formal request for group booking with MSRTC, including concessions.
Dashboard.informTransportDescription: Already booked a bus? Submit your vehicle and ticket details here.
Dashboard.trackStatusDescription: Check the status of your submitted private and MSRTC booking requests.
Dashboard.sewaVolunteerDescription: For Sewadal members to submit their arrival and departure details in advance.

RequestQuote.title: Private Bus Request
RequestQuote.subtitle: Fill in your travel details, and our team will provide a competitive quote within 24 hours.
RequestQuote.confirmDescription: This will submit your request. Our team will review it and contact you with a final quote via your provided mobile number or email. Are you sure you want to proceed?
RequestQuote.successDescription: Thank you for your request. Our team will contact you shortly with a quote. You can also track the status of your request online using your mobile number.
RequestQuote.errorFillDetails: Please fill all trip details: locations, dates, times, bus type, and at least one passenger.
RequestQuote.errorContactInfo: Please provide your contact information: Name, Mobile, and Email.
RequestQuote.errorReturnDate: Return date must be after the journey date.

InformTransport.title: Inform Transport Dept.
InformTransport.subtitle: Submit details of your pre-booked bus for Samagam coordination.
InformTransport.uploadHint: Upload images or PDFs of your tickets (up to 10 files).
InformTransport.maxFilesError: You have reached the maximum limit of 10 files.
InformTransport.maxFilesReached: You have reached the 10 file limit.
InformTransport.cameraDeniedError: Camera access was denied. Please enable camera permissions in your browser settings.
InformTransport.cameraNotSupportedError: Camera is not supported on this device.
InformTransport.fillFieldsError: Please fill out all required fields and upload at least one ticket file.
InformTransport.captureTicketDesc: Position your ticket in the frame and click capture.
InformTransport.successDesc: Thank you for providing your travel details. This will help us coordinate arrivals smoothly.

MsrtcBooking.title: MSRTC Group Booking Request
MsrtcBooking.subtitle: Submit a formal request for MSRTC group bookings. Our team will coordinate with MSRTC and get back to you.
MsrtcBooking.purposePlaceholder: e.g., Attending 59th Annual Nirankari Samagam, Sangli
MsrtcBooking.concessionInfo: You have {count} passengers eligible for ST concession. Final fare will be confirmed by the Transport Dept. after MSRTC verification.
MsrtcBooking.errorSelectDepots: Please select both origin and destination depots to calculate fare.
MsrtcBooking.errorFillAllFields: Please fill in all required fields: organizer info, trip details, and at least one passenger.
MsrtcBooking.errorAuth: Could not authenticate your session. Please try again.
MsrtcBooking.successDescription: Your group booking request has been received. Our team will verify the details with MSRTC and contact you on {mobile} with the final confirmation and payment details.

SewaVolunteer.title: Sewa Volunteer Arrival Information
SewaVolunteer.subtitle: Form for Sewadal members to submit their arrival details for Samagam coordination.
SewaVolunteer.selectDutyPeriod: Select from the official duty calendar
SewaVolunteer.selectTransportMode: Select how you will be arriving
SewaVolunteer.notesPlaceholder: e.g., Arriving with family, specific transport details...
SewaVolunteer.errorFillAllFields: Please fill in all required fields to submit your details.
SewaVolunteer.errorAuth: Could not authenticate your session. Please try again.
SewaVolunteer.successDescription: Thank you for providing your arrival information. This will help us greatly in coordinating the transport and accommodation.
